notes: The Twenty-Ten Technical Assessment Group - skeptics who meet at a coffee shop to evaluate claims - launches a formal investigation into the suspected Grigsu forgeries. Their reputation for neutrality gives the eventual verdict weight.
The Bureau's Chief Analyst formally opens an investigation into Delayed Clarity. The Committee on Pattern Recognition is assigned to study the phenomenon systematically.
Cousins asks: 'It's not just that the kids are smart. It's that they're too smart. Statistically impossible.'
First documented concern about 'reconstruction attacks'â€”seekers who ask enough questions to rebuild the protected text. Led to query pattern monitoring.
Jackson is the edge case that breaks all classification. Both retrieval-based and geometry-based approaches fail. Central case study for thesis synthesis.
